name: Fumbling in the Darkness [$200 Puzzle Challenge!]
name_original: Fumbling in the Darkness [$200 Puzzle Challenge!]
description:
Fumbling in the Darkness is a Zorklike eldritch puzzle and survival visual novel with horror like elements. It's designed to be submitted into the blackthornprod jam #3 which has the theme of "Less is more", and this game has literally no art, but has a tonne of sound design...

There is over 12600 lines of code in there, so please let me know if you receive any errors, so I can fix it. I have tested it, and the game IS solvable.

You can find us on twitter @CutlassGame, and you can find our YouTube channel by navigating through the trailer video!

Submissions:

Once verified this could be our winner!

Other entries are still valid for minor prizes!

New build uploaded 27/01/21

Changelog:

-Fixed Filling Water skin

-Fixed a bug where you die after picking up a Water skin

-Fixed a bunch of bugs where walking into a wall wouldn’t work

-Fixed a bunch of generic syntax issues that the compiler didn’t flag

-Fixed a bug where going east in one room would enter unrecoverable state

New build uploaded 28/01/21

Changelog:

-Fixed two wall checks.

-Fixed an item check

-Fixed a keycheck error
